item.title: Store and Fabrics Review: Atelier Brunette
item.description: This post is not sponsored. No matter how delighted I might seem. It is not. You can find links to stores & fabrics mentioned here at the end of this article. Though that doesn’t mean you should jump right there. The Prologue While most of the stores selling non-essential goods remain closed in Germany and the majority of people staying in their homes, it is no wonder that e-commerce was experiencing a rise in 2020.
